titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Department of Athletics, Yale University, Motion Picture Film Documenting Track and Field
Guide to the Department of Athletics, Yale University, Motion Picture Film Documenting Track and Field
titlestmt.author: compiled by Daniel Hartwig

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Friday January 11, 2019 at 09:43

did.unittitle: Department of Athletics, Yale University, Motion Picture Film Documenting Track and Field

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The item is a motion picture film of a 1950 track and field meet in Los Angeles in which the Yale University men's track team participated.

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Forms part of Yale Record Group 38-B (YRG 38-B), Records documenting specific sports at Yale.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: The material was transferred from the Department of Athletics, 2007.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The materials are open for research .Original audiovisual materials, as well as preservation and duplicating masters, may not be played. Researchers must consult use copies, or if none exist must pay for a use copy, which is retained by the repository. Researchers wishing to obtain an additional copy for their personal use should consult Copying Services information on the Manuscripts and Archives web site.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Department of Athletics, Yale University, Motion Picture Film Documenting Track and Field (RU 1061). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Yale University records are arranged and described at the accession level by the creating office. The University Archives creates collection level descriptive records, but typically does no further arrangement and description at the accession level.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The item is a motion picture film of a 1950 track and field meet in Los Angeles in which the Yale University men's track team participated.

did.unittitle: Men's track and field motion picture film
Track and field meet (Los Angeles, CA)
